description: CD Genomics proprietary GenSeqTM Technology provides comprehensive Single-Cell Sequencing services. These global gene expression patterns in single cells already have dramatically advanced cell biology. CD Genomics’s Single-Cell Sequencing conference focuses on the links between cell variation in tissues and organ function and further elucidates the origins of diseases. If you have additional requirements or questions, please feel free to contact us.
name: Single-Cell Sequencing
